HWA_InterruptConfig_t Struct Reference
HWA Driver External Data Structures

HWA Interrupt Config. More...

#include <drivers/hwa/hwa.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t interruptTypeFlag
 
HWA_ParamDone_IntHandlerFuncPTR callbackFn
 
void * callbackArg
 
uint8_t dstChannel
 

Detailed Description

HWA Interrupt Config.

HWA interrupt config parameters that are used with the HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt() call.

Field Documentation

void* HWA_InterruptConfig_t::callbackArg

Callback function argument

HWA_ParamDone_IntHandlerFuncPTR HWA_InterruptConfig_t::callbackFn

Callback function to be called when interrupt destination is CPU

uint8_t HWA_InterruptConfig_t::dstChannel

DMA channel number to be triggered on paramset completion if interrupt destination to DMA is desired

uint8_t HWA_InterruptConfig_t::interruptTypeFlag

Flag to specify whether Interrupt to CPU and/or DMA is desired on completion of paramset. Defines for HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE can be ORed to specify this flag
